resources.string: eggs: 2 sugar powder: 60 g flour: 50 g butter: 60 g dark chocolate 75%: 90 g

1. melt butter and chocolate. mix everything\\n2. in other dish mix eggs and sugar powder with fork\\n3. add flour and mix\\4. mix all the ingredients until smooth\\5/ turn on the oven and heat it to 175C. pour mixture in forms/ bake for 6-7 minutes\\6. leave it in the turned off over by 1 minute
